[Home](index.html) &gt; <a href="browser-logs.html">@datadog/browser-logs</a> &gt; <a href="browser-logs.logsglobal.html">LogsGlobal</a> &gt; <a href="browser-logs.logsglobal.createlogger.html">createLogger</a>

## LogsGlobal.createLogger property

The Datadog browser logs SDK contains a default logger `DD_LOGS.logger`<!-- -->, but this API allows to create different ones.

See \[Define multiple loggers\](https://docs.datadoghq.com/logs/log\_collection/javascript/\#define-multiple-loggers) for further information.

**Signature:**

```typescript
createLogger: (name: string, conf?: LoggerConfiguration) => Logger;
```
